alert.note: Alert for Northern Carroll; Northern Grafton (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 15 at 3:34AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...STORM PULLS AWAY THIS MORNING... .Low pressure will gradually pull away from the region today. A few snow showers remain expected this morning with some minor accumulations possible, but the steadiest and heaviest precipitation is over. However, slippery spots continue to be expected this morning. In addition, gusty winds today will be capable of bringing down branches still weighed down by snow. ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Additional snow accumulations up to two inches this morning will add to slippery conditions. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph today. * WHERE...Northern Carroll and Northern Grafton Counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT this morning. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions will impact this morning`s commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
